tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_approval_status (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name STRING,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    approval_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    patent_number VARCHAR(50),
    approval_status VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_approval (
    approval_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    approval_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_product FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES pharmaceutical_products(product_id)
);
